      org.json.simple.JSONArray findRestaurants(org.json.simple.JSONObject params)
      Takes in a JSONObject map containing search parameters, queries the database for restaurants that match the criteria and returns an array containing the names of the matching restaurants.

      Queries the database for all beverage types.

      Takes in the name of the restaurant as parameter, and queries the beverages from the database.
      void linkRestaurants(java.lang.String path)
      Takes in a path to a .json file containing an array of restaurants as JSONObjects, which contain an array of beverages as JSONObjects as parameter, and creates a record of each restaurant if needed and creates the relations between the restaurants and beverages listed in the file.
      void parseBeverages(java.lang.String path)
      Takes in a path to a .json file containing an array of beverages as JSONObjects and writes them to the database if they do not already exist.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • linkRestaurants

        public void linkRestaurants(java.lang.String path)
        Takes in a path to a .json file containing an array of restaurants as JSONObjects, which contain an array of beverages as JSONObjects as parameter, and creates a record of each restaurant if needed and creates the relations between the restaurants and beverages listed in the file.
        Parameters:
        path - to .json file

      • findRestaurants

        public org.json.simple.JSONArray findRestaurants(org.json.simple.JSONObject params)
        Takes in a JSONObject map containing search parameters, queries the database for restaurants that match the criteria and returns an array containing the names of the matching restaurants.
        Parameters:
        params - - Search parameters as a JSONObject, with keys: 'types', 'brands', 'serving', 'abvMin', 'abvMax', 'price'.
        Returns:
        - An array containing the names of matching restaurants.
